subject: Ready Set Sim | Simsonn
description_text:
Hello Simsonn team!

Thank you for reaching out. We are always open to collaboration. Did your
team have anything in mind? I'm happy to jump on a call.

Also, will you be at the Sim Racing Expo in Germany this week?

Thanks,


-- 
Ian Strommen
Founder
